name: Upload new click conversions into Google Ads from new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description:
Please disable your ad blockers when working with our Google Ads apps. The ad blockers may cause unexpected behavior.

This template regularly checks for new rows in a Google Sheets spreadsheet and uses the retrieved information to upload conversions to Google Ads. 

The template is using [this sample](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1UJhAq1Wm5CeMri8b-NJGYrS1SbXxl-RuaR1bxIFiCxc/edit?usp=sharing) Google Sheets spreadsheet as the source of the data. You should make a copy of it before configuring the template.

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template by clicking the clock icon on the first module.
